GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.4.124
GSD.description:
cxgb4: avoid accessing registers when clearing filters

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.124 by commit 0bf49b3c8d8b3a43ce09f1b2db70e5484d31fcdf, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit b1a79360ee862f8ada4798ad2346fa45bb41b527. For more details please see the references link.
